snippet.title: Microsoft Flight Simulator - Official City Update 4 Launch Trailer | gamescom 2023
snippet.description: Microsoft Flight Simulator has unveiled the new City Update 4 to the game bringing new content that celebrates the region of Western Europe with Annemasse, Geneva, Ghent, Luxembourg City, and Rotterdam. Each city was built using the latest high-resolution geographic data and provide the most realistic experience yet of these historic locales. City Update 4 for Microsoft Flight Simulator is available now for Xbox Series S|X, PC, Xbox Game Pass, and PC Game Pass.
